channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pavement used as storage, 29th September
item.description:
Ongoing issue for the shop fronts Wandsworth Road either side of Killyon Road. Latest is actually quite a pleasant addition (BBQ Barrels) but must be a H&S danger when cooking unattended as there's a real burn risk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4-5, Killyon Terrace, Clapham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Piccadilly Circus - please remove unauthorised attachment of Union Jack flag to WCC Street asset. It is cable tied to a lamp column besides the eros statue. Please refer to the attached photographs. Thanks., 29th September
item.description:
Piccadilly Circus - please remove unauthorised attachment of Union Jack flag to WCC Street asset. It is cable tied to a lamp column besides the eros statue. Please refer to the attached photographs. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Regent Street St James's, Mayfair, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5 black plastic bags of builders rubble dumped in Westcott Road opposite 19 Westcott Road, SE17, 29th September
item.description:
5 large black plastic sacks of rubble dumped overnight on evening of Sunday 28 September. Located in the road opposite 19 Westcott Road, London SE17
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westcott Road, Elephant and Castle, London

item.title: Flytipping in public street and road, 29th September
item.description:
Rubbish left on the street, blocking both oart if the road and public path. Please urgently arrange for someone to collect. Apparently been moved around the area from communal bin site to now being left on the street and partially blocking road. Been around at least a few weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haydens Close, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass and leaves everywhere by tree, 29th September
item.description:
There’s broken glass mixed with leaves and rubbish everywhere around the tree on the street but it never seems to be seen to despite binmen using this as an area to have a break. This needs proper sweep and removal of all broken glass
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springfield Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bed frame and junk left on footpath, 29th September
item.description:
Bed frame and junk left on footpath. This was previously reported and was told that it was resolved but it hasn't been

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Forburg Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped outside collection hours, 29th September
item.description:
3 large black bin lines and 1 full of leaves. Whoever this is, they are doing it constantly outside of collection hours. (Monday or Thursday nights would be acceptable I imagine but not Monday mornings or Tuesdays after collection as happened only recently.)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Ennismore Gardens, Knightsbridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish and broken glass everywhere, 29th September
item.description:
There’s rubbish and broken glass everywhere in the alleyway making it hugely dangerous for humans and animals alike. Binmen often seem to park their trolleys there but don’t clean up the area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9b, Upper Wickham Lane, Welling, London

item.title: Pavements have not been cleaned from roadworks, 29th September
item.description:
The pavements have sand, dust stones, pieces of tarmac etc from where the gas works has taken place. The barriers have been moved but the pavements have not be swept and cleaned.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chestnut Drive, Welling, London

item.title: Bins on street, 29th September
item.description:
Outside 98 Muswell Hill Road are 6 smelly bins right next to the bus shelter where people sit. This is unpleasant and unhygienic (and not permitted by the council). Please arrange for them to be moved inside the boundary of the property as they have been there for some time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Muswell Hill Road, Muswell Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extreme wet dog fouling besides a tree which is in front of 95 Fernhead Road., 29th September
item.description:
Extreme wet dog besides a tree which is in front of 95 Fernhead Road. People get in and out their cars besides this tree and people cross the road besides this tree and children play near this tree. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet
